name: THE GLOBAL WAR ON TERROR MEMORIAL FOUNDATION
description: To build a memorial honoring heroes.
sampleDescriptions: To assist in the organizing, fundraising, advocacy, and coordinating efforts to build a memorial on the National Mall in Washington D.C. to honor our fallen warriors, US services members, their famili
